member.name: P:SEUebung.Interfaces.IUrl.Path
member.summary: Returns the path of the url, without parameter.

member.name: P:SEUebung.Interfaces.IUrl.Parameter
member.summary: Returns a dictionary with the parameter of the url. Never returns null.

member.name: P:SEUebung.Interfaces.IUrl.ParameterCount
member.summary: Returns the number of parameter of the url. Returns 0 if there are no parameter.

member.name: P:SEUebung.Interfaces.IUrl.Segments
member.summary: Returns the segments of the url path. A segment is divided by '/' chars. Never returns null.

member.name: P:SEUebung.Interfaces.IUrl.FileName
member.summary: Returns the filename (with extension) of the url path. If the url contains no filename, a empty string is returned. Never returns null. A filename is present in the url, if the last segment contains a name with at least one dot.

member.name: P:SEUebung.Interfaces.IUrl.Extension
member.summary: Returns the extension of the url filename, including the leading dot. If the url contains no filename, a empty string is returned. Never returns null.

member.name: P:SEUebung.Interfaces.IUrl.Fragment
member.summary: Returns the url fragment. A fragment is the part after a '#' char at the end of the url. If the url contains no fragment, a empty string is returned. Never returns null.
